title: SEO Blog Post Generator
description: Generate high-ranking, SEO-optimized blog posts with proper structure and keyword integration.
prompt:
Write a comprehensive, SEO-optimized blog post about [TOPIC]. 

Target Audience: [AUDIENCE]
Keywords to include: [KEYWORDS]

Structure:
1. Catchy Headline (H1)
2. Engaging Introduction (hook the reader)
3. Key Takeaways (bullet points)
4. Detailed Body Paragraphs (use H2 and H3 subheadings)
5. FAQ Section
6. Conclusion with Call-to-Action

Tone: Professional yet accessible.
Length: 1500 words.
tips: Be specific about the target audience for better tone matching.

title: React Component Architect
description: Create robust, accessible, and typed React components with best practices.
prompt:
Act as a Senior React Developer. Create a [COMPONENT_NAME] component using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

Requirements:
- Fully typed props interface
- Accessibility compliance (ARIA attributes)
- Responsive design using Tailwind classes
- Error handling where appropriate
- Clean, modular code structure

Include usage examples and explain any complex logic.
tips: Specify if you need client-side or server-side rendering considerations.

title: Cinematic Midjourney Prompt
description: Generate photorealistic, cinematic image prompts for Midjourney v6.
prompt:
Create a detailed Midjourney v6 prompt for the following concept: [CONCEPT].

Include details for:
- Subject appearance and pose
- Lighting (e.g., volumetric, golden hour, cinematic)
- Camera angle and lens type (e.g., 35mm, wide-angle)
- Environment and background
- Art style (e.g., photorealistic, cyberpunk, oil painting)
- Aspect ratio (--ar 16:9)

Format the output as a single copy-pasteable code block.
tips: Use specific camera lens descriptions for more realistic results.

title: Startup Pitch Deck Outliner
description: Structure a compelling pitch deck for investors.
prompt:
Create a 10-slide pitch deck outline for a startup in the [INDUSTRY] industry.

Startup Name: [NAME]
Problem Solved: [PROBLEM]
Unique Value Proposition: [UVP]

For each slide, provide:
1. Slide Title
2. Key Talking Points
3. Suggested Visuals/Charts

Ensure the narrative flows logically from problem to solution to market opportunity.
tips: Provide as much detail about your business model as possible.

title: Email Marketing Sequence
description: Draft a high-converting email drip campaign for new subscribers.
prompt:
Write a 5-email welcome sequence for new subscribers to [NEWSLETTER/PRODUCT].

Goal: Convert free subscribers to paid customers.

Email 1: Welcome & Value Delivery
Email 2: Problem Agitation & Storytelling
Email 3: Social Proof & Case Studies
Email 4: Soft Sell & Benefits
Email 5: Hard Sell & Urgency

Tone: Persuasive, empathetic, and urgent but not spammy.
tips: Define the 'One Big Idea' for your campaign before starting.

title: Resume Bullet Point Enhancer
description: Transform weak resume points into impact-driven achievements.
prompt:
Rewrite the following resume bullet points to be more impactful, using the 'Action Verb + Task + Result' formula.

Original Points:
[PASTE_POINTS_HERE]

Focus on quantifying results (numbers, percentages) where possible. Use strong action verbs. Tailor the language for a [TARGET_JOB_TITLE] role.
tips: Paste the job description for even better alignment.

title: Creative Story Starter
description: Overcome writer's block with unique story concepts and opening lines.
prompt:
Generate 5 unique story concepts based on the genre: [GENRE].

For each concept, provide:
1. A one-sentence logline
2. A gripping opening paragraph
3. A potential plot twist

Themes to explore: [THEMES].
tips: Mix genres for more interesting results (e.g., Sci-Fi Western).

title: Python Data Analysis Script
description: Generate a Python script for analyzing CSV data using Pandas.
prompt:
Write a Python script using Pandas to analyze a CSV file named 'data.csv'.

The script should:
1. Load the data
2. Clean missing values (fill with mean for numeric, mode for categorical)
3. Perform exploratory data analysis (summary statistics)
4. Generate a correlation matrix
5. Create a visualization using Matplotlib/Seaborn for [SPECIFIC_METRIC]

Comment the code heavily for a beginner.
tips: Describe your dataset columns for more accurate code.

title: LinkedIn Thought Leadership Post
description: Write a viral-style LinkedIn post about a professional insight.
prompt:
Draft a LinkedIn post about [TOPIC].

Structure:
- Hook: A controversial or surprising statement.
- Body: Personal story or observation backing up the hook.
- Lesson: The professional insight or takeaway.
- Call to Action: Question to encourage comments.

Formatting: Use short paragraphs and line breaks for readability. Add 3-5 relevant hashtags.
tips: Share a personal failure or success story for authenticity.

title: Executive Summary Synthesizer
description: Condense long reports into a concise executive summary.
prompt:
Summarize the following text into a one-page Executive Summary.

Text: [PASTE_TEXT_HERE]

Sections required:
1. Overview
2. Key Findings
3. Risks & Challenges
4. Recommendations

Keep it concise, professional, and suitable for C-level executives.
tips: Indicate the maximum word count if needed.
